document.full_text: top trade officials from pakistan and india will open two days of talks on wednesday to push commercial ties, as the nuclear-armed rivals seek to build on goodwill from last month's successful bout of "cricket diplomacy".
document.title: breakthrough unlikely in pakistan-india trade talks
lines_and_colors: top trade officials from pakistan and india will open two days of talks on wednesday to push commercial ties, as the nuclear-armed rivals seek to build on goodwill from last month's successful bout of "cricket diplomacy".
